quote_first: It comprised all that was required of the servant, from eight in the morning, exactly at which hour Phileas Fogg rose, till half-past eleven, when he left the house for the Reform Club - all the details of service, the tea and toast at twenty-three minutes past eight, the shaving-water at
quote_last: , and the toilet at twenty minutes before ten.
title: Around the World in 80 days
author: Jules Verne
